articles.author: Julianne Geiger
articles.title: Oil Prices Retreat As OPEC Cuts Another 684KBPD, Brazil Joins OPEC - OilPrice.com
articles.description: Oil prices began to retreat on Thursday afternoon as it became clear that OPEC members were agreeing to voluntary cuts beginning in the new year, and that those cuts would be announced only by each member country instead of by the group as a whole.
